main.one_click: One click to your new Lixiang
main.create_ideal: Create your ideal LiXiang with our configurator
main.about_block1_text: YAS AUTO is the official dealer of the Lixiang brand in Uzbekistan. We specialize in selling modern, smart, and eco-friendly vehicles designed for those who value innovation, comfort, and safety.
main.about_block2_text:
• Official 3-year warranty on all Lixiang vehicles
• Cars available in stock — fast purchase with no waiting
• Complete documentation and full transaction support
• Personalized approach — we help you choose the right car
• After-sales service and customer support

We offer more than just cars — we deliver a new level of mobility powered by technology.
main.lorem_text:
Li 9 is a new generation flagship electric vehicle that combines premium comfort, advanced technology and impressive technical characteristics.

It is designed for those who value safety, innovation and maximum convenience for both the driver and passengers. The spacious interior with an intelligent multimedia system, adaptive lighting and voice control function turns every trip into a pleasure.

With a large power reserve, intelligent driver assistance system and well-thought-out suspension, Li 9 is ideal for both urban conditions and long-distance travel.

car.description_text: LiXiang L6 is a modern hybrid SUV with high performance, all-wheel drive, and elegant design.
